build.description:
Build Oh My Posh configuration variants from modular YAML files.

This command scans the config/ directory for YAML files, merges them according to the build configuration,
and outputs the specified variant(s) to the out/ directory.

If no variant is specified, all variants defined in the build configuration will be built.
Use 'omp variants' to see available variants.
build.summary: Build Oh My Posh configuration variants

variants.description:
List all available configuration variants defined in the build configuration.

Each variant represents a different combination of segments, features, and configurations
that can be built from the modular YAML files in the config/ directory.

detailed.description: Show detailed information about each variant
detailed.name: detailed

variants.summary: List available Oh My Posh configuration variants
